Posts.Content: mymomhascancer wrote: hi! i'd like to knit my mom a hat, but i'm having trouble finding a good pattern. she wants something that is going to cover to the back of her neck. knitting, purling, adding/deceasing, yarn oversÂ and slipping stitches are al no problem for me, but NO cabling(unless you can come and untangle the mess :P !) any links would be much appreciated. Anna I don't have cancer, my mom does ;). I am 15 and have had type 1 diabetes almost 5 years. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: knited 'chemo caps' pattern? mymomhascancer mymomhascancer
